meta.review_content:
Vodacom has no way of contacting them. (Even from outside S.A.) The stupid TOBI robot on their site does not work on a computer. Ony on a mobile device. the so called "Customer Care" e-mail address has been discontinued.
Surely someone must be curious about why there are no inquiries arriving on their idiot robot chat.
I can see from al the reviews that I signed up with the WRONG company.
As soon as I get back to SA - I am closing my account of 15 years - and getting another Provider.
***** You - Vodacom. Thanks for nothing.
